statements: UPDATE VehicleLocation SET latitude = 37.7749, longitude = -122.4194, timestamp = '2022-04-01 10:30:00' WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE VehicleLocation SET latitude = 40.7128, longitude = -74.0060, timestamp = NOW() WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE VehicleLocation SET longitude = -122.4194, timestamp = '2021-11-30 14:30:00+00' WHERE vehicle_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE vehicle_locations SET location = POINT(23.456, 45.678), timestamp = '2022-10-25 08:30:00' WHERE vehicle_id = 1234;

UPDATE vehicle_movements SET movement_type = 'DEPARTURE', start_location = POINT(12.345, 54.321), end_location = POINT(32.154, 76.543), start_timestamp = '2022-10-25 09:00:00', end_timestamp = '2022-10-25 09:30:00' WHERE movement_id = 5678;
UPDATE vehicle_locations SET location = POINT(37.7749, -122.4194), timestamp = NOW() WHERE vehicle_id = 100
UPDATE vehicle_movements SET movement_type = 'Arrival', end_location = POINT(37.7749, -122.4194), end_timestamp = NOW() WHERE movement_id = 200
UPDATE vehicles SET location_id = 5 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE movements SET movement_type = 'Departure' WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
UPDATE vehicles SET vehicle_name = 'Car', location_id = 2, last_update = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE movements SET location_id = 5, movement_type = 'Arrival', movement_timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00' WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
UPDATE vehicles SET last_known_location = 'New York' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE deliveries SET delivery_status = 'Completed' WHERE delivery_id = 1;

UPDATE deliveries SET delivery_status = 'Completed', driver_id = 201 WHERE vehicle_id = 102;
